title: South Norfolk Council – 2021 Statement on Alleged Allegations Concerning Emma Hodds
author: admin
summary: The statement made by South Norfolk Council, in conjunction with Broadland District Council, on 14 September 2021.
content:
Individuals and teams received awards for their incredible achievements, including their work, on the front line, in the fight against Covid-19.This work included protecting our most vulnerable residents.
